## ToolboxCategory.closeIcon\_() method

Adds appropriate classes to display a closed icon.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  iconDiv | Element \| null | The div that holds the icon. |
